00001 //
00002 // Snap: Implementation of the TFileCat class
00003 //
00004 #include "FileCat.h"
00005 #include "readdir.h"
00006 
00007 
00008 // Remove a slash or backslash (if any) from the end of a string
00009 void ChompSlash(std::string& s)
00010 {
00011       if ( s.empty() ) return;
00012 
00013       if ( *s.rbegin() == '\\' || *s.rbegin() == '/' ) {
00014             s.erase( s.length() - 1 );
00015       }
00016 }
00017 
00018 
00019 // Build a new file catalogue by recursively traversing the root directory
00020 void TFileCat::NewCat(std::string root)
00021 {
00022       fRootDir = root;
00023       ChompSlash(fRootDir);
00024 
00025       fFileCat.clear();
00026 
00027       TraverseDir(fRootDir);
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00031 // Look for a given file in the catalogue
00032 // Unless pathIncludesRoot == true, will prepend the root directory to path
00033 bool TFileCat::FindFile(std::string path, bool pathIncludesRoot) const
00034 {
00035       if (pathIncludesRoot) return fFileCat.find(path) != fFileCat.end();
00036       else return fFileCat.find(fRootDir + '\\' + path) != fFileCat.end();
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 // Delete a given file from the catalogue
00041 // Unless pathIncludesRoot == true, will prepend the root directory to path
00042 size_t TFileCat::RemoveFile(std::string path, bool pathIncludesRoot)
00043 {
00044       if (pathIncludesRoot) return fFileCat.erase(path);
00045       else return fFileCat.erase(fRootDir + '\\' + path);
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 // Delete all files from a given directory in the catalogue
00050 // Unless pathIncludesRoot == true, will prepend the root directory to path
00051 size_t TFileCat::RemoveDir(std::string dir, bool pathIncludesRoot)
00052 {
00053       if ( !pathIncludesRoot ) dir = fRootDir + '\\' + dir;
00054       ChompSlash(dir);
00055       std::string dirlower = dir + '\\';
00056       std::string dirupper = dir + char('\\'+1);
00057 
00058       TCatalogue::iterator upper = fFileCat.upper_bound(dirupper);
00059       TCatalogue::iterator lower;
00060 
00061       int deleted = 0;
00062 
00063       while ( ( lower = fFileCat.lower_bound(dirlower) ) != upper) {
00064             fFileCat.erase(lower);
00065             deleted++;
00066       }
00067 
00068       return deleted;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 // Recursively traverse a directory, adding regular files to the catalogue
00073 void TFileCat::TraverseDir(std::string dir, int depth)
00074 {
00075       using std::string;
00076 
00077       if (!dir.empty()) dir += '\\';
00078 
00079       TReadDir readDir((dir + "*").c_str());
00080 
00081       char const* fileName;
00082       unsigned attrib;
00083 
00084       while ( readDir.NextFile(fileName, attrib) ) {
00085             if (string(".") == fileName || string("..") == fileName) continue;
00086 
00087             string fullPath = dir + fileName;
00088 
00089             if (attrib & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY) {
00090                   if (depth < 0) TraverseDir(fullPath);
00091                   else if (depth > 0) TraverseDir(fullPath, depth-1);
00092             }
00093             else {
00094                   fFileCat.insert(fullPath);
00095             }
00096       }
00097 }
